attributes.action: Extra pay for key workers who have had to work though covid 19.
attributes.additional_details: we have had people put on furlough getting 80% of there wages paid for staying at home with no risk to them self and then you have key workers having to go to work for the same normal pay with a much much greater risk of catching covid 19 I feel it’s unfair that key workers are risking there lives for nothing extra when people are getting 80% with no risk. I think it would be nice if the government was to show a thank you for risking there lives to keep this county going
attributes.background: I think it would be a good thing to reward the key workers who have kept the county going during covid 19 crisis. Not all company’s have given there staff a reward bonus for working though it to keep the county going.
